articles.title: Google is rolling out a new feature allowing users to change their Gmail address - CNBC
articles.description: Google says it is rolling out a feature that lets users change their Gmail addresses in a long-requested update to their email policy.

articles.description: A free update for existing Switch players

articles.title: How Does Android's New AirDrop-Style Feature Actually Work? - SlashGear
articles.description: Android's new AirDrop feature is built in Rust for better security, stems from an EU ruling that required Apple to open up AirDrop to third-party devices.

articles.title: 5 Of The Best Electric Vehicles Under $50k, According To Consumer Reports - bgr.com
articles.description: Cars like the Hyundai Ioniq 6, Mustang Mach‑E, and Nissan Ariya are among the best electric vehicles under $50,000, as shown by reviews from Consumer Reports.

articles.title: Make your aging computer feel brand new with Windows 11 Pro, now just $10 - Mashable
Researchers create world's smallest programmable, autonomous robots - Tech Xplore
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Pennsylvania and University of Michigan have created the world's smallest fully programmable, autonomous robots: microscopic swimming machines that can independently sense and respond to their surroundings, operate for months …
